title: FEATURE JOBS: Lost in Love Photography, Mood Media, Edrolo + More
text:
Lost in Love Photography are recruiting for a Videographer/editor/photographer (MEL) to work alongside their team in the office and out on the field. The ideal candidate will have customer service experience, an interest in fashion trends and a passion for travel. Apply now.

Mood Media seek a part-time Creative Assistant (SYD). Reporting to the Head of Music Curation you must have the ability to enter data quickly and accurately as well as having a good knowledge of music styles that can be applied creatively. Find out more.

The Media Store are hiring for a Performance Media Director (SYD) to lead day-to-day client communication, develop leading digital strategies and manage the team’s workflow. You will be responsible for developing acquisition focused plans across all media channels to meet the clients’ business objectives and KPIs. Check it out.

Edrolo are on the hunt for a recent graduate to join their Client Support (MEL) team. With over 700 client schools across Victoria and New South Wales, and a growing team of internal clients, they’re looking for someone to join them in supporting their ever-increasing customer base. Find out more.

Want more great job opportunities? Here you go:

MCN seek a TV Account Coordinator (MEL) to join their talented and successful team and strongly support the 3 Account Managers to maximise the TV/Broadcast revenue for MCN. Apply now.

oOh Media are currently recruiting for a Digital Marketing Specialist (SYD) to own the end-to-end in-house digital marketing strategy & execution process. Check it out.

Network 10 are looking for a TV Sales Assistant (SYD) to provide account management support and timely and accurate information to the Sales team and their clients. Find out more.
